pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, January 25, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Hamilton, Ontario

Private meetings

8:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit an automotive resource centre. He will be joined by the Minister responsible for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario, Filomena Tassi.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

9:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet retreat.

Closed to media
